bug.author: Quasimondo
bug.summary: Example in demo_overview.md needs to be updated
bug.description:
The video example on demo_overview.md throws
ERROR: unknown command line flag 'write_json'
The correct argument is --write_keypoint_json so the example should be changed to: ./build/examples/openpose/openpose.bin --video examples/media/video.avi --num_gpu 2 --write_video output/result.avi --write_keypoint_json output/

comments.comment: Is there any example of execution code to generate xml files?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Quasimondo>@Quasimondo</denchmark-link> Thank you! I have just updated it. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/shiangyoung>@shiangyoung</denchmark-link> Please check the doc <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/demo_overview.md>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/demo_overview.md</denchmark-link> -->
